meaningMnemonic: Even though it gets <kanji>mix</kanji>ed up as it <kanji>passes through</kanji> itself, modern <vocabulary>traffic</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>transport</vocabulary> systems are pretty amazing. This word refers to traffic and transport for pedestrians, bikes, cars, buses, trains, planes... anything that gets us from A to B.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
